text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/38a5f517a70d7b76361152d2898d7f826c5b2491|patch 8.2.0276: Vim9: not allowing space before ")" in function call>
patch 8.2.0276: Vim9: not allowing space before ")" in function call

Problem:    Vim9: not allowing space before ")" in function call is too
            restrictive. (Ben Jackson)
Solution:   Skip space before the ")".  Adjust other space checks.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0276: Vim9: not allowing space before ")" in function call · vim/vim@38a5f51
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0276: Vim9: not allowing space before ")" in function call · vim/vim@38a5f51
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: not allowing space before ")" in function call is too restrictive. (Ben Jackson) Solution: Skip space before the ")". Adjust other space checks.

patch 8.2.0279: Vim9: no test for deleted :def function

Problem:    Vim9: no test for deleted :def function.
Solution:   Add a test.  Clear uf_cleared flag when redefining a function.

attachments.title: patch 8.2.0279: Vim9: no test for deleted :def function · vim/vim@63ce484
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: no test for deleted :def function. Solution: Add a test. Clear uf_cleared flag when redefining a function.

patch 8.2.0274: hang with combination of feedkeys(), Ex mode and :global

Problem:    Hang with combination of feedkeys(), Ex mode and :global.
            (Yegappan Lakshmanan)
Solution:   Add the pending_exmode_active flag.

attachments.text: Problem: Hang with combination of feedkeys(), Ex mode and :global. (Yegappan Lakshmanan) Solution: Add the pending_exmode_active flag.
